title: Improve the policy environment to reap the benefits of digitalization in the finance sector, says ILO - ILO
content: Improve the policy environment to reap the benefits of digitalization in the finance sector, says ILO  ILO
description: A better framework would harness the full potential of technological innovation in the financial sector, which provides jobs for more than 50 million people, and help achieve decent work and sustainable enterprise development.
